12de8177-cabb-463d-a299-90dbd8e90192.description: The earner of this badge is qualified to be a productive systems analyst on a systems development team employing a model-based systems engineering approach while using SysML.
12de8177-cabb-463d-a299-90dbd8e90192.name: SysML Model User

alignments.name: System Modeling Language
alignments.description: SysML specifies a general-purpose modeling dialect for systems engineering so that systems engineering modelers may learn to apply it and modeling tool vendors may implement it.

badge_template_activities.title: Earner passed the SysML Model User exam.

1fcb02f0-ddae-4952-bf07-4ceb1c134f3d.description: The earner of this badge is qualified to be a high-level analyst on a business process modeling project team.
1fcb02f0-ddae-4952-bf07-4ceb1c134f3d.name: BPM 2 Fundamental Professional

alignments.name: Business Process Model and Notation
alignments.description: BPMN is the de-facto standard for business process diagrams, which is intended to be used directly by the stakeholders who design, manage and realize business processes. BPMN has an easy-to-use flowchart-like notation that is independent of any specific implementation environment.

alignments.name: Business Process Maturity Model
alignments.description: The BPMM is intended to facilitate organizational readiness for external or internal technological product or service deployment and can be used as a process model by itself or as a framework for improvement efforts based on other models.

alignments.name: Business Motivation Model
alignments.description: The BMM provides a structure for developing, communicating and managing business plans in an organized manner.

244fbda2-81f6-4e6d-9f76-d504a3fd0d1a.name: UML 2 Foundation Professional

b01d713c-066c-453f-b3e6-ecc75bea8ee3.description: The earner of this badge is qualified to lead a system engineering project or contribute as a top-ranked system engineering team member (e.g., lead systems engineer).
b01d713c-066c-453f-b3e6-ecc75bea8ee3.name: SysML Intermediate Model Builder

alignments.name: System Modeling Language
alignments.description: SysML specifies a general-purpose modeling dialect for systems engineering so that systems engineering modelers may learn to apply it and modeling tool vendors may implement it.

badge_template_activities.title: Earner passed the SysML Intermediate Model Builder exam.

7aea1df4-ec38-42bb-801e-34a4166c3234.description: The earner of this badge is qualified to be the lead systems architect/engineer and implement SysML in model-based systems engineering, extend its adoption in other areas/departments as well as establish new projects and support them through their lifecycles.
7aea1df4-ec38-42bb-801e-34a4166c3234.name: SysML Advanced Model Builder

alignments.name: System Modeling Language
alignments.description: SysML specifies a general-purpose modeling dialect for systems engineering so that systems engineering modelers may learn to apply it and modeling tool vendors may implement it.

alignments.name: SysML-Modelica Transformation
alignments.description: SysML-MT is a general-purpose systems modeling dialect that can be used to create and manage models of systems using well-defined constructs with underlying semantics and a graphical notation.

alignments.name: Object Constraint Language
alignments.description: The OCL is a well-defined dialect purely based on the common core of the Unified Modeling Language and Meta-Object Facility.

alignments.name: Requirements Interchange Format
alignments.description: ReqIF is an open, non-proprietary exchange format, which is exchanged by transferring XML documents that comply to its format.

alignments.name: UML Profile for Modeling and Analysis of Real-Time Embedded (MARTE) Systems
alignments.description: MARTE adds capabilities to the Unified Modeling Language for model-driven development of real-time and embedded systems (RTES), which provides support for specification, design and verification/validation stages.

alignments.name: Unified Profile for DoDAF and MODAF (UPDM)
alignments.description: The UPDM supports 1) modeling architectures for complex systems, 2) modeling consistent architectures for system-of-systems, 3) modeling service-oriented architectures, 4) analysis, specification, design and verification of complex systems and 5) improves the ability to exchange architecture info among related tools that are UML-based and tools.

badge_template_activities.title: Earner passed the SysML Advanced Model Builder exam.

5aeb69d5-a762-4126-a08c-5f04146e2ebb.description: The earner of this badge is qualified to design and generate interoperating modules, improve upon other models and clearly explain the most appropriate UML elements and attributes of structures that should be used in complex and larger system models.
5aeb69d5-a762-4126-a08c-5f04146e2ebb.name: UML 2 Intermediate Professional

alignments.name: Unified Modeling Language
alignments.description: UML is a graphical dialect for visualizing, specifying, constructing, and documenting the artifacts of distributed object systems.

c56f7083-705b-4416-a8f7-08035b3982a5.description: The earner of this badge is qualified to be a business analyst or business architect in an enterprise business process modeling program, direct business training and quality assurance for business process projects or be a business process implementation team lead integrating an application within an existing architecture.
c56f7083-705b-4416-a8f7-08035b3982a5.name: BPM 2 Intermediate Business Professional

alignments.name: Business Process Model and Notation
alignments.description: BPMN is the de-facto standard for business process diagrams, which is intended to be used directly by the stakeholders who design, manage and realize business processes. BPMN has an easy-to-use flowchart-like notation that is independent of any specific implementation environment.

alignments.name: Decision Model and Notation
alignments.description: DMN creates a standardized bridge for the gap between business decision design and decision implementation.

alignments.name: Semantics of Business Vocabulary And Business Rules
alignments.description: SBVR defines a vocabulary and rule set for documenting the semantics of business vocabularies and rules for their simplified exchange between organizations and software tools.

badge_template_activities.title: Earner passed the BPM 2 Business Intermediate exam.

68706449-4906-4872-a3d9-4fe704b5906f.description: The earner of this badge possesses knowledge of the complete UML library of elements and attributes available for modeling structure and behavior in up to the largest system models as well as metamodeling based on other standards in the UML family. The earner is qualified to be the company UML guru at the highest level of technical management, leading workgroups and presentations, making decisions on analysis, design and development proposals and evaluating their results

a1c4dae5-a60a-416d-946f-c1da093b6315.description: The earner of this badge is qualified to be a lead business analyst or business architect on major business process modeling projects, advise senior management on business process optimization, provide business guidance on large-scale enterprise-wide business process deployments, establish and manage the business side of a business process modeling program as well as design and provide in-depth business-oriented training and quality assurance.
a1c4dae5-a60a-416d-946f-c1da093b6315.name: BPM 2 Advanced Business Professional

87e7a9b3-0219-42e2-bbfc-d7971ec4f912.name: BPM Intermediate Technical Professional

alignments.name: Business Process Model and Notation
alignments.description: BPMN is the de-facto standard for business process diagrams, which is intended to be used directly by the stakeholders who design, manage and realize business processes. BPMN has an easy-to-use flowchart-like notation that is independent of any specific implementation environment.

alignments.name: Business Process Definition Metamodel: Volume 2
alignments.description: The BPDM Vol. 2 is a framework for understanding and specifying the processes of an organization or community.

alignments.name: ebXML Business Process Specification Schema
alignments.description: The ebXML BPSS defines a standard language via which business systems may be configured to support execution of business collaborations consisting of business transactions.

alignments.name: Semantics of Business Vocabulary And Business Rules
alignments.description: SBVR defines a vocabulary and rule set for documenting the semantics of business vocabularies and rules for their simplified exchange between organizations and software tools.

alignments.name: Web Services Choreography Description Language
alignments.description: The WS-CDL is an XML-based language that describes peer-to-peer collaborations of participants by defining, from a global viewpoint, their common and complementary observable behavior; where ordered message exchanges result in accomplishing a common business goal.

badge_template_activities.title: Earner passed the BPM Technical Intermediate exam.
